trans-unit.source: Click the following checkboxes to consider or to ignore the corresponding broken links.
trans-unit.target: Click the following checkboxes to consider or to ignore the corresponding broken links.

trans-unit.source: Path to the content element, which contains the broken link.
trans-unit.target: Path to the content element, which contains the broken link.

trans-unit.source: Type of the element containing the broken link, its headline and the field in which the broken link is located.
trans-unit.target: Type of the element containing the broken link, its headline and the field in which the broken link is located.

trans-unit.source: URL to which the broken link is pointing.
trans-unit.target: URL to which the broken link is pointing.

trans-unit.source: Date and time of the last update of the information in each table row.
trans-unit.target: Date and time of the last update of the information in each table row.

trans-unit.source: UID of the start page for this task.
trans-unit.target: UID of the start page for this task.

trans-unit.source: Level of pages the task should check.
trans-unit.target: Level of pages the task should check.

trans-unit.source: TSconfig Code which defines settings for linkvalidator to be used for this task.
trans-unit.target: TSconfig Code which defines settings for linkvalidator to be used for this task.

trans-unit.source: Email address to which an email report is sent.
trans-unit.target: Email address to which an email report is sent.

trans-unit.source: Only send an email, if new broken links were found.
trans-unit.target: Only send an email, if new broken links were found.

trans-unit.source: Define a template to be used for the email.
trans-unit.target: Define a template to be used for the email.
